feed.title: Holzforschung

entry.title: Applying colorimetry and visible spectroscopy to discriminate wood species in a forest management area in the amazon floodplain

entry.title: Assessment of surface crack- ratio and length of weathered Norway spruce using a new region-based image segmentation method

entry.title: Performance assessment of a novel electrical conductivity-based instrument for stratified moisture content measurement in wood
